Data.text_description:
The probability of amount of rainfall being large (A=1) is 0.1050. 
The probability of humidity level being high (B=1) is 0.5368. 
For those with humidity level being low (B=0), the probability of soil moisture content being high (C=1) is 0.4621. 
For those with humidity level being high (B=1), the probability of soil moisture content being high (C=1) is 0.7680. 
For those with amount of rainfall being small (A=0) and soil moisture content being low (C=0), the probability of crop yield being high (D=1) is 0.2315. 
For those with amount of rainfall being small (A=0) and soil moisture content being high (C=1), the probability of crop yield being high (D=1) is 0.5250. 
For those with amount of rainfall being large (A=1) and soil moisture content being low (C=0), the probability of crop yield being high (D=1) is 0.3153. 
For those with amount of rainfall being large (A=1) and soil moisture content being high (C=1), the probability of crop yield being high (D=1) is 0.6282.
